article_title: Affordable Care Act’s Impact on One Small Business
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: Oct. 4 (Bloomberg) -- Don Fox, CEO at Firehouse Subs, discusses the impact of the Affordable Care Act on his small business. He speaks on Bloomberg Television’s “In The Loop.”
